Text: bedankt voor de film groetjes georg

English: just to be sure this is in English and has English subs?

Nederlands: Gewoon om er zeker van is dit in het Engels en heeft Engels subs?

Assuming the End-NLSubs I see around are by the same people you need to replace the dude that made the english subs for this.

They are so horrible... Normally saying something like "Every to every other line had mistakes in them", that isn't the case here, that's the sad truth. Very often the mistakes were so bad that it became impossible to make out what was being said.

Having struggled with deciphering what was mistake and what was real for a while I decided to try to ignore the subs... They simply ruined it.

God, just saw a little more...
